mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ORDER_AMOUNT), 0) FROM order_supply_info, ORDER_INFO WHERE SUPPLY_NUM = #{supplyNum} AND ORDER_INFO.ORDER_STATUS = '배송 전' AND ORDER_SUPPLY_INFO.ORDER_NUM = ORDER_INFO.ORDER_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_SUPPLY_INFO( SUPPLY_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, ORDER_NUM ) VALUES ( #{supplyNum}, #{orderAmount}, (SELECT MAX(ORDER_NUM) FROM ORDER_INFO) )
mapper.select: SELECT SUPPLY.SUPPLY_NUM, ORDER_SUPPLY_NUM, ORDER_NUM, SUPPLY_NAME, SUPPLY_PRICE, ORDER_AMOUNT, SUPPLY_STANDARD, SUPPLIER, SUPPLY_CAUTION FROM SUPPLY, ORDER_SUPPLY_INFO WHERE SUPPLY.SUPPLY_NUM = ORDER_SUPPLY_INFO.SUPPLY_NUM AND ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum} AND SUPPLY.SUPPLY_NUM IN(SELECT SUPPLY_NUM FROM ORDER_SUPPLY_INFO WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum}) ORDER BY SUPPLY_NUM;
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_SUPPLY_INFO SET ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount} WHERE ORDER_SUPPLY_NUM = #{orderSupplyNum}
